info.description:
made with 3 torus sections * 2 symmetries 

mouse controls camera.
info.name: knot

renderpass.code:
float PI = 3.14159,
       r = .16;                                // rope radius
#define FRAME 0

#define T(q)     ( length(vec2(length(q.xy)-1.,q.z)) - r )        // torus
#define S(a,da)  ( abs(mod(atan(q.y,q.x)-a+PI, 2.*PI) -PI) - da ) // section
#define Ts(q,a,da) max(T(q),S(a,da) )                             // torus section
#define R(a)       mat2( cos( a + vec4(0,33,11,0)) )              // rotation

float knot(vec3 p) {                           // --- quarter of knot
    vec3 q; float t;
    q = p, q.xz *= R(PI/4.), t = Ts(q,PI/4.,PI/4.),
    q = p, q.xz *= R(-.75*PI), q.yz *= R(-.2*PI), q-=vec3(0,-.19,-.59), t = min(t,Ts(q,3.*PI/8.,PI/8.)),
    q = p.yzx, q.xz *= R(.75*PI), q.yz *= R(-PI), q-=vec3(-1,-1,0)+vec3(-.0,-.31,-.8), t = min(t,Ts(q,PI/8.,PI/8.)),
  //q = p-vec3(-.57,.55,0), t = min(t, max( length(q.xy)-r, -(q.z-1.3)) ); // straight part
    q = p, q.yz*=R(.1), q-=vec3(-.57,.41,0), t = min(t, max( length(q.xy)-r, -(q.z-1.35)) ); // straight part with angle
    return t;   
}

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {
    float t = 1e9,tx,ty,tz;
    vec3  q = iResolution,
          D = vec3(.3*(U+U-q.xy)/q.y, -1),     // ray direction
          P = 10./q, p, a, qa;                 // marching point along ray 
    vec2  M = (length(iMouse.xy)<20.) ? vec2(0): 3.14*(2.*iMouse.xy-q.xy)/q.y,
        //C = 3.14*vec2(-.3,.4),               // camera
          C = M==vec2(0) ? vec2(iTime) : M;
    O-=O;
    for ( O++; O.x > 0. && t > .01 ; O-=.04 )
        p = P,
        p.xz *= R(C.x), p.yz *= R(C.y),        // camera rotation
        q = p,
#if FRAME
        a = abs(qa=q),                         // draw frame
        t = max(min( ty= max(a.x,a.z) -.01, min( tx= max(a.z,a.y) -.01 ,tz= max(a.x,a.y) -.01 )  ),length(q)-2.),
#endif
        t = min(t, knot(p)),                   // left-right symmetry
        t = min(t, knot(p*vec3(1, -1, 1))),
        p -= vec3(-.4,0,1),
        p = -p,                                // top-down symmetry
        t = min(t, knot(p)),
        t = min(t, knot(p*vec3(1, -1, 1))),
        P += t*D;                              // step forward = dist to obj

#if FRAME                                      // --- color frame
    if (t==tx) O.gb*=.4+.4*sign(qa.x);         // x axis: red   ( whiter on positive side )
    if (t==ty) O.rb*=.4+.4*sign(qa.y);         // y axis: green
    if (t==tz) O.rg*=.4+.4*sign(qa.z);         // z axis: blue
#endif
}
